POST http://localhost:3000/editor?token=THE-TOKEN

bzw. als Query Param angeben: token - THE-TOKEN

JSON-Body:
{
  "name": "TestImg",
  "desc": "Just a Test",
  "img": {
    "base64": ""
  },
  "texts":["Hello", "World"],
  "xCoordinates":[0, 50],
  "yCoordinates":[0, 10],
  "metadata": "someMeta",
  "status": 0,
  "width": 100,
  "height": 100,
  "pixels": 10000
}
